content.rendered: An effective and easy-to-perform treatment, suitable for any woman who wishes to increase the volume of the breast or shape it, without undergoing surgery to insert silicone implants. The treatment is suitable for women with a flat chest who wish to enlarge it, or women who wish to shape the chest by changing the volume of only specific parts -the lower pole or the upper pole of the chest- or to correct asymmetry.
